text: Imagine watching the world cup on FOX

author: Budget-Comedian-1790
text: imagine not watching the wc on fox

author: TheGardiner
text: was so good on BBC1 or ITV. were there enough explosions on the FOX broadcasts?

author: CharlieSwisher
text: Yea sorry, that was bit much. I’d j woken up not a morning person lmao, but I stand by they were being arrogant

author: TheGardiner
text: I sense a bit of anger? Nothing bougie about it, I watched every game on the gauntlet that is qatarstreams, and had to close about 10 popups every time I wanted to do anything. I would rather do that all day long than watch it on Fox. The choices were usually BBC/ITV, FOX and TSN. No chance I'm even watching it on the last two.

author: brimister47
text: Kind of an insane take though. I definitely would've preferred BBC, but Fox wasn't nearly as bad as you're making it out to be. What did you hate so much about it?

author: TheGardiner
text: It probably wasnt anywhere near as bad as I think. In the few minutes I watched, I couldnt handle the color commentary or talk between plays by the casters. They have a habit of making it very much about themselves, using lots of more modern turns of phrase bordering on memes. Hard to explain really.

author: brimister47
text: Lol it’s probably hard to explain because you only gave it a few minutes before making up your mind.

author: TheGardiner
text: No, it was a few minutes multiple times and was always awful almost right away. Stuff like one announcer saying to the other 'I'm feeling you'. Basically a step away from colloquialisms like 'I'm picking up what you're throwing down'. Lot of in jokes and this type of very topical and breezy conversation you'd expect two friends at a bar to be having. It was a classic Americanism of putting the self at the centre of attention, rather than the subject being covered. It was clear as day.

author: brimister47
text: Yup, definitely an insane take. But glad you were able to find streams you enjoyed. Was a great world cup

author: CharlieSwisher
text:
You sensed anger b/c pretentious pricks like you tend to piss me off.

If Americans always put themselves at the center of things, then you certainly sound American. You couldn’t watch it cuz you were personally offended by a mundane turn of phrase???

Honestly it’s the most American shit I’ve heard. Sure things keep popping up in the Middle East but we’ll j keep fighting that off b/c anything’s better than hearing someone else talk about how things are going for them.

And this is coming from an actual American. Who listens to the bbc everyday on the radio.

But once you again you can take your precious BBC and shove it up your ass til it’s gushing red and white stripes and you’re seeing stars.

Enjoy your caviar dick nose.
